ListPreference.android:title: GPS Listener Timeout
ListPreference.android:summary: The maximum time the GPS listener will be allowed to run looking for a better GPS location

ListPreference.android:title: GPS Max Accuracy
ListPreference.android:summary: GPS maximum inaccuracy in meters before listener will stop looking for a better value

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Start at Boot?
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: Program and service will not start at boot
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: Program and service will start at boot
